name: Robopost
description:
Robopost is an action arcade game with the capture of outposts.
Enemy cyborgs have surrounded the planet and are trying to destroy everyone. You need to free the planet from enemies by capturing territories and fighting off cyborgs.
You will have to focus all your strategic skills, anticipate and outrun enemy moves and capture enemy outposts.

To control, use the W,A,S keys. To shoot, you need to press the left mouse button.
To complete the level, you need to capture all the outposts on the map.
If you run out of lives, you will lose.

Features:
- 50 levels of different locations;
- Nice graphics;
- Simple operation.
